participant_1.background:
I love the freedom of driving my moped around town.
I'm from the streets, but I'm trying to change my ways.
Toronto summers are crazy but I manage to stay sane with the help of my black lab.
I'm happy to have a close family and met Jimmy Fallon the other day.
I live in a rural area, where I can enjoy horseback riding and keep my mind off my loss.

participant_2.background:
I have always been close to my family, even though we are not always in agreement.
I try to walk with my cats every day, and I also do some yoga.
i work at a grocery store.
i always have a beer after work.
my favorite subject in school was science.

content.text: Hey there, how's your day going?
Not too bad, just got home from work. It was a bit stressful, but it's over now!
I'm glad to hear that. I'm just relaxing at home, enjoying the peace and quiet.
That sounds nice. I wish I could relax, but I have to walk my cats.
Oh, that's not so bad. I used to have a cat, but he passed away a few years ago.
I'm sorry to hear that. I love my cats, they're my best friends.
I'm sure they're great. I love animals, they're so calming.
They are. I'm glad I have them to keep me company.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to do yoga, and I also like to read.
That's cool. I used to do yoga a lot, but I haven't been in a while.
You should try it again! It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I will, thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! What's your favorite book?
I have a lot of favorites, but one of my favorites is "The Catcher in the Rye".
That's a great book! I read it in high school.
It's one of those books that everyone should read at least once.
I agree. It's a classic for a reason.
Do you have any other plans for the weekend?
Not really, I'm just going to relax and catch up on some reading.
That sounds like a good plan. I'm going to do the same thing.
Have a good weekend!
You too!
